body:
I'm currently unable to run `flake8`.

`spack install py-flake8` runs without complaint, but the result does not work:

```
[hartzelg@spack-0 spack-without-x]$ ./opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/py-flake8-3.0.4-qglmd76ahe64jh4hxbfmepabx6p474ve/bin/flake8
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/py-flake8-3.0.4-qglmd76ahe64jh4hxbfmepabx6p474ve/bin/flake8", line 5, in <module>
    from pkg_resources import load_entry_point
ImportError: No module named pkg_resources
[hartzelg@spack-0 spack-without-x]$
```

Activating it also brings no joy:

```
[hartzelg@spack-0 spack-without-x]$ spack activate py-flake8
```
